Post claims an AWS AgentCore-based agentic Slack bot using an AgentCore MCP Gateway to centralize MCP tools and authentication.

  • Source: Let’s do DevOps

A short post announcing a full-architecture and code walkthrough for an AWS AgentCore agentic Slack bot, with an enthusiastic call to deploy it.

item.title: github: Work with Copilot coding agent in Slack
item.description:
The GitHub app for Slack now integrates with the GitHub Copilot coding agent, enabling users to generate pull requests directly from Slack conversations. The feature is rolling out and announced on the GitHub Blog.

  • Source: GitHub
